subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lee Westwood of England won the St. Jude Classic, his second career PGA Tour victory and first since 1998, by beating Robert Karlsson of Sweden on the fourth hole of a sudden-death playoff.
snippet: Lee Westwood of England won the St. Jude Classic, his second career PGA Tour victory and first since 1998, by beating Robert Karlsson of Sweden on the fourth hole of a sudden-death playoff.
